field.comment: When a security result is for a given context, this contains the id
field.name: contextId

field.comment: What is the target (artifact?) that it occurs in
field.name: targetId

field.comment: The error type, a static identifier of this type of error
field.name: type

field.comment: A particular instance of the error, for instance the type might be "required", the instance might be "required:something". If no particular instance is available, it is the same as type
field.name: instance

field.comment: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization
field.name: title

field.comment: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
field.name: detail
